name: Digger Man
summary:
An excellent and addictive puzzle game with 32 levels. The player must control character and gather 20 jewels to open a doorway to the next level before his life gauge expires. Eat fruit for more life and avoid bugs and falling rocks. 
Face, the Digger Man maker, released 7 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1988. 
 
Other machines made by Face during the time period Digger Man was produced include Gururin, Money Puzzle Exchanger, Nostradamus, Sand Scorpion - Sasori, Quiz DNA No Hanran, and Albatross.
